'''Hongdou''' {{Lang|zh=红豆|zh_rm=Hóngdòu}} is an [[NPC]] in [[Liyue Harbor]]. She can be found at the staircase leading to [[Bubu Pharmacy]].

==Profile==
Hongdou, nicknamed Doudou by her mother, [[Chenxiang]], is a chronically ill girl who lives in Liyue Harbor. Apparently Hongdou's condition is chronic and incurable, but medicine from [[Bubu Pharmacy]] is able to keep the symptoms at bay. During the commission [[Good Medicine Tastes Bitter]], you can bring Chenxiang some [[Almond Tofu]] to bribe Hongdou to take the bitter medicine.
